Global Telecommunication System (GTS) bụ netwọk nkwukọrịta dị nchebe nké na-eme ka mgbanwe ógè nke data ihu igwe site na ọdụ ihu igwe, satellites na ébé amụma ihu igwe, na-enye amụma ihu igwe dị oke egwu, ịdọ áká ná ntị, na ịdọ áká na ntị. Ọ bụ World Meteorological Organization guzobere ya n'afọ 1951 n'okpuru mmemme World Weather Watch màkà mgbanwe n'efu na nke na-emeghe nkè ozi ihu igwe.
GTS nwèrè netwọk jikọtara ọnụ nke sekit site n'otu isi gaa n'otu, na sekit dị ichè íchè nke jikọtara ụlọ ọrụ nkwukọrịta ihu igwe
Okporo ụzọ nke GTS nwèrè njikọta nke njikọ nkwukọrịta ala na satellite
Ha na-agụnye sekit site n'otu isi gaa n'otu, sekit site na ọtụtụ isi màkà nkesa data, sekit dị ichè iché site na isi ruo n'isi màkà nchịkọta data, ya na sekit abụọ nwèrè ọtụtụ isi
Meteorological Telecommunication Centres na-ahụ màkà ịnata data ma na-eziga ya na GTS circuit
A na-ahazi GTS na ọkwa atọ:
A na-ejikọta nchịkọta data na / ma ọ bụ usoro nkesa data na GTS dị ka ihe dị mkpa nke ọkwa ụwa, mpaghara na mba nké GTS

Usoro nchịkọta data na-arụ ọrụ site na geostationary ma ọ bụ nke dị nso na mbara igwe na-agba gbụrụ-gbúrụ gbụrụ-gbúrụ ébé ebe obibi, gụnyere Argos System, a na-eji ya eme ihe n'ọtụtụ ebe màkà nchịkọta data site na ikpo okwu nchịkọta data
A na-anakọta data mmiri site na International Maritime Mobile Service na Inmarsat satellites.
WMO (2013) Akwụkwọ ntuziaka na Global Telecommunications System WMO mbipụta 386 E debere ya  Wayback Machine
